#Text=After years of seclusion in the South , this master of water , earth , and fire seeks to add airbending to her list of skills .
#Text=And under the tutelage of Tenzin , Avatar Aang 's son , she should go far .
#Text=But will this cool , calm , collective master of air be able to tame this hotheaded teen ?
#Text=" Korra says : " And , in the final round , the Buzzard Wasps won with a decisive knockout !
#Text=What do you say we go to the arena tonight , catch a few pro-bending matches ?
